item.title: Intro to Canvas with Particles
item.description: This is what we’ll be making! If you can’t see anything then your device doesn’t support canvas. You can still follow along, but it’ll be more fun if you can see your work. Canvas is a super fun way to create animations on the browser! It’s also very easy to get started. To make it even easier to start, use CodePen to write your code. I’ll be sharing CodePen examples along the way.
